DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate change quality life global functioning across manualized peer-group preventive intervention child parent psychiatric addictive problem .
DOC.brief_title: Child Results Following Preventive Children Parents With Psychiatric Addictive Problems ( COPP ) Groups
DOC.detailed_description: Self-reported quality life base group-interviews `` ILK '' `` Kindl '' general adaptive functioning ( CGAS ) report teacher parent measure , follow-up relative manualized peer-group preventive intervention . Parents also complete self-reports anxiety depressive symptom , personality , bond attribution intervention .
DOC.criteria: Family include Parent psychiatric addictive problem acute severe disorder
